title: How to Play Monkey in the Middle

steps.headline: Have at least 3 or more players.
steps.description: Ask people if they would like to play a game of monkey in the middle but you'll need at least 3 players to start the game.

steps.headline: Decide who's the monkey and who starts with the ball.
steps.description: Have everyone playing do a quick match of rock, paper, scissors the last 2 standing battle each other and whoever wins gets first pick of being the monkey or starting with the ball.

steps.headline: Form a circle and spread out.
steps.description: The monkey stands in the middle and everyone else should form a large circle around the monkey.

steps.headline: Pass the ball to anyone except the monkey.
steps.description: The person starting with the ball passes the ball to someone in the circle excluding the person beside them and the monkey. Continue to pass the ball to other players.

steps.headline: Catch the ball.
steps.description: Be ready to catch the ball when it's being passed to you. Chase after the ball if you miss it before the monkey comes. The monkey is allowed to run after the ball if someone drops it or try to grab the ball when it's thrown in the air but no monkey guarding is aloud.

steps.headline: Know when to get in the middle.
steps.description: If you throw the ball to someone and the monkey gets it or you make a bad pass switch spots with the person in the middle to become the new monkey. Continue playing the game until everyone gets a turn in the middle.

text: Have at least 3 or more players. Ask people if they would like to play a game of monkey in the middle but you'll need at least 3 players to start the game. Decide who's the monkey and who starts with the ball. Have everyone playing do a quick match of rock, paper, scissors the last 2 standing battle each other and whoever wins gets first pick of being the monkey or starting with the ball. Form a circle and spread out. The monkey stands in the middle and everyone else should form a large circle around the monkey. Pass the ball to anyone except the monkey. The person starting with the ball passes the ball to someone in the circle excluding the person beside them and the monkey. Continue to pass the ball to other players. Catch the ball. Be ready to catch the ball when it's being passed to you. Chase after the ball if you miss it before the monkey comes. The monkey is allowed to run after the ball if someone drops it or try to grab the ball when it's thrown in the air but no monkey guarding is aloud. Know when to get in the middle. If you throw the ball to someone and the monkey gets it or you make a bad pass switch spots with the person in the middle to become the new monkey. Continue playing the game until everyone gets a turn in the middle.
